resume.name: JIMENA ARMENTEROS

experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant - Actuarial Science Lab
experience.description: Collaborated with faculty on a comprehensive study regarding stochastic modeling for mortality rate projections. Utilized Python to implement Lee-Carter models and analyzed historical census data to identify trends in longevity risk.

experience.title: Quantitative Risk Researcher
experience.description: Conducted research on the application of Bayesian inference to property and casualty insurance pricing. Developed automated R scripts for high-frequency data cleaning and used SQL to manage large-scale datasets for predictive loss modeling.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
